title: List of all current section 38 Highways Agreements

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide a list of all current Section 38 Highway Agreements that have been entered into with developers, detailing agreement date & road name or development site which it applies to. By current I mean where the road/development has not yet been adopted but is subject to a S38.
Yours faithfully,
Nathan Forrest

Dear Nathan Forrest,
Thank you for your request for information relating to list of all current
section 38 Highways Agreements which we received on 19/08/2024.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 17/09/2024. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
This Email, and any attachments, may contain non-public information and is
intended solely for the individual(s) to whom it is addressed. It may
contain sensitive or protectively marked material and should be handled
accordingly. If this Email has been misdirected, please notify the author
immediately. If you are not the intended recipient you must not disclose,
distribute, copy, print or rely on any of the information contained in it
or attached, and all copies must be deleted immediately. Whilst we take
reasonable steps to try to identify any software viruses, any attachments
to this Email may nevertheless contain viruses which our anti-virus
software has failed to identify. You should therefore carry out your own
anti-virus checks before opening any documents. Sheffield City Council
will not accept any liability for damage caused by computer viruses
emanating from any attachment or other document supplied with this e-mail
References
Visible links
1. mailto:[sheffield%20city%20council%20request%20email]

Dear Nathan Forrest,
Thank you for your request for information relating to List of all current
section 38 Highways Agreements which we received on 19/08/2024.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
1. Jaguar Retirement Homes Limited – Hall Road – 17^th March 2014.
2. Sheffield Housing Company – Park Spring Drive (Norfolk Park 5a) –
14^th April 2014.
3. Gleeson Developments Limited – Remington Road (Colley Phase 2) – 14^th
January 2016.
4. Taylor Wimpey – Crookes Road (Tapton Hall) – 26^th September 2016.
5. Stonebridge Homes – Samuel Fox Avenue (Phase 1) – 10^th November 2016.
6. Sheffield Housing Company – Falstaff 2 – 26^th May 2017.
7. Sheffield Housing Company – Park Grange Drive (Norfolk Park 4 /
Bluestones) – 24^th July 2017.
8. Sheffield Housing Company – Earl Marshall Road – 4^th December 2017.
9. Miller Homes – Moss Way (former Westfield School) – 18^th December
2017.
10. Avant Homes – Hastings Road – 21^st December 2017.
11. Gleeson Regeneration Limited – Queen Mary Road / Fretson Road – 9^th
January 2018.
12. Persimmon Homes – Beighton Road – 5^th March 2018.
13. Stonebridge Homes – Samuel Fox Avenue (Phase 2) – 4^th June 2018.
14. Sanctuary Housing Association – Errington Road (Arbourthorne Hotel) –
7^th November 2018.
15. Avant Homes – Greaves Lane – 13^th November 2018.
16. Erris Homes – Wortley Road (Bellamy Close) – 21^st January 2019
17. Sheffield Housing Company – Manor 10 & 11 – 26^th February 2019.
18. Stonebridge Homes – Samuel Fox Avenue (Phase 3) – 10^th April 2019.
19. Avant Homes – Stopes Road – 29^th November 2019.
20. Miller Homes – Hemsworth Road – 5^th February 2020.
21. Gleeson Regeneration Limited – Cradock Road – 20^th August 2020.
22. Skye Edge SPV Limited – Skye Edge Avenue – 11^th February 2021.
23. Tribeka Developments (Woodhouse) Limited – Beighton Road – 23^rd
February 2021.
24. Jaguar Estates Limited – Stradbroke Road (Valley Brook Close) – 10^th
August 2021.
25. BDW Trading Limited – Oughtibridge Mill (Spine Road) – 27^th January
2022.
26. Avant Homes – Moorthorpe Way (Site E) (Phase 1) – 25^th August 2022.
27. Avant Homes – Moorthorpe Way (Site E) (Phase 2) – 25^th August 2022.
28. Sheffield Housing Company – Falstaff Phase 4 – 31^st January 2023.
29. Sheffield Housing Company – Frank Wright Close (Norfolk Park 5b) –
31^st January 2023.
30. Sheffield Housing Company – Lytton Road – 31^st January 2023.
31. Caddick Developments Limited – Ferrars Road – 6^th April 2023.
32. Sheffield Housing Company – Manor 12 & 13 – 11^th April 2023.
33. Walshaw One Limited – Main Street, Hackenthorpe – 11^th April 2023.
34. Gleeson Developments Limited – Margetson Crescent (Colley Phase 4) –
18^th May 2023.
35. Newett Homes – Uppergate Road (Century Chase) – 4^th July 2023.
36. Grantley Homes Limited – Burncross Road (Thorncliffe Mews) – 1^st
August 2023.
37. Vistry Partnerships Yorkshire Limited – Foxhill Crescent – 28^th
September 2023.
38. Esh Construction – Fir View Gardens – 16^th November 2023.
39. Elite House Builders Limited – Ross Street / Whitwell Street – 2^nd
April 2024.
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [1]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[2]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ

Subject: Freedom of Information request - List of all current section 38
Highways Agreements
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide a list of all current Section 38 Highway Agreements that
have been entered into with developers, detailing agreement date & road
name or development site which it applies to. By current I mean where the
road/development has not yet been adopted but is subject to a S38.
Yours faithfully,
Nathan Forrest
